newsArray.title: Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs historic six sixes molded me into the competitor I am today: Stuart Broad
creator: Deepa Sharma
newsArray.description: England‚Äôs veteran pacer, Stuart Broad, looked back on a defining moment in his cricketing career, attributing his transformation into a formidable competitor to Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs iconic six sixes during the 2007 T20 World Cup clash between India and England in Durban. In a press conference, Broad acknowledged that the unforgettable encounter, was instrumental in shaping [‚Ä¶] The post Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs historic six sixes molded me into the competitor I am today: Stuart Broad appeared first on KalingaTV.
newsArray.content: England‚Äôs veteran pacer, Stuart Broad, looked back on a defining moment in his cricketing career, attributing his transformation into a formidable competitor to Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs iconic six sixes during the 2007 T20 World Cup clash between India and England in Durban. In a press conference, Broad acknowledged that the unforgettable encounter, was instrumental in shaping his mental approach to the game. The momentous match on September 19, 2007, saw Yuvraj Singh, in a sensational display of power-hitting, become the first batsman to dispatch six consecutive sixes in an over during a T20 International. The 22-year-old Broad found himself on the receiving end of Yuvraj‚Äôs ferocious assault, as the Indian batsman sent the ball soaring into all corners of the stadium, propelling India‚Äôs total beyond the formidable 200-run mark. Reflecting on that day, Broad admitted, ‚ÄúYeah, it was obviously a pretty tough day. What would I have been: 21, 22? [22] I learned loads. I pretty much based a whole mental routine through that experience, knowing that I was left very short as an international performer in that moment. I‚Äôd rushed my preparation. I didn‚Äôt have any sort of pre-ball routine. I didn‚Äôt have any focus, particularly, and I started building my ‚Äòwarrior mode‚Äô that I call it after that experience.‚Äù ‚ÄúYou obviously go through massive peaks and troughs, and when you look at someone like Stokesy‚Äôs career, he‚Äôs done that sort of thing as well. Most players have. But ultimately I think it‚Äôs that bounce-back ability and that ability to be able to put poor days behind you because certainly one thing over the past whatever ‚Äì 15, 16 years ‚Äì you have a lot more bad days than good days in cricket so you have to be able to deal with them to make sure your good days can flourish,‚Äù Broad concluded. Prev News Next News

Se trata de un ciertamente inc√≥modo para los medios de comunicaci√≥n y que el m√°ximo organismo del f√∫tbol mundial ha tenido que adaptar para el campeonato del mundo. . Habitualmente es un estadio de rugby, donde juegan los Wellington Lions y los Wellington Hurricanes. Es tambi√©n el hogar del equipo de f√∫tbol Wellington Phoenix, de la A-League. A ello hay que sumar que dentro del estadio, lo que en este Mundial est√° siendo el centro de trabajo de los medios de comunicaci√≥n, . Concretamente es la Escuela de Wellington de Cricket, dirigida por la Asociaci√≥n de Cricket de Wellington.. De hecho, el techo conserva las redes y las mallas necesarias en dicho deporte. En una de las paredes, aparecen nombres hist√≥ricos del cricket de la ciudad. Por otro lado, el recorrido que existe entre la tribuna habilitada para los medios de comunicaci√≥n es tan largo que para poder facilitar el trabajo al t√©rmino de los encuentros. . Aqu√≠ debut√≥ contra Costa Rica con una victoria contundente por 3-0 gracias a los goles de la selecci√≥n 'tica' en propia puerta, Esther Gonz√°lez y Aitana Bonmat√≠, con lo cual ya sabe lo que es lograr una victoria en este especial enclave a las afueras de la ciudad en el que, adem√°s, se nota el paso de los trenes por las v√≠as aleda√±as al terreno de juego.

newsArray.title: ‚ÄòTo Take 600 Wickets and‚Ä¶‚Äô Team India Head Coach Rahul Dravid Praises 'Special Cricketer' Stuart Broad With England Pacer Set to Retire After Ashes 2023
newsArray.description: India head coach Rahul Dravid has described the retiring England fast bowler Stuart Broad as a "special cricketer", whose great partnership with James Anderson will be remembered for ages.
newsArray.content: Bridgetown, July 30 : India head coach Rahul Dravid has described the retiring England fast bowler Stuart Broad as a "special cricketer", whose great partnership with James Anderson will be remembered for ages. The 37-year-old Broad on Saturday announced that he will retire from international cricket after the conclusion of the ongoing final Ashes Test against Australia at The Kia Oval in London. IND vs WI 2nd ODI 2023: Bowlers, Shai Hope Help West Indies Level Series . "He (Broad) has been a terrific bowler, he has been a great. His partnership with Jimmy Anderson will always be remembered," Dravid said after India lost to West Indies by six wickets in the second ODI here. "Anderson and Broad the whole decade they played for England, they have really put in some fantastic performances," said the batting legend and former India captain. "To take 600 wickets and to play the number of Test matches he has takes a special kind of cricketer," he added. Broad has been a key member of the England Test side since making his debut against Sri Lanka in December 2007. He will retire with 167 caps, and is the second highest Test wicket-taker after Anderson among pacers. He had taken 600 wickets before the ongoing final Ashes Test. The right-arm seamer, who made his first-class debut for Leicestershire in 2005 and later moved to Nottinghamshire, has played 121 ODIs and 56 T20 Internationals, picking up 178 and 65 wickets respectively. Dravid congratulated Broad on a wonderful career. "My best wishes to him and congratulations on a fantastic career. I hope he gets to finish it off in the best possible way he wants to," he said.

newsArray.title: Lanka Premier League 2023: All You Need to Know About Fourth Edition of Sri Lanka's T20 Tournament
newsArray.description: The season will see the participation of five teams - Colombo Strikers captained by Niroshan Dickwella, Dambulla Aura captained by Kusal Mendis, Galle Titans led by Dasun Shanaka, B-Love Kandy captained by Wanindu Hasaranga and the defending champions Jaffna Kings will be led by veteran Srilankan allrounder Thisara Perera.
newsArray.content: Colombo [Sri Lanka], July 29 : The Lanka Premier League (LPL) is scheduled to take place from July 30 to August 21, 2023. This will be the fourth edition of the highly anticipated league which will feature some top stars from global cricket fighting for the coveted title. As per a press release from LPL, the matches will be held across two venues Colombo and Kandy for the 2023 edition. ‚ÄòPlaying Virat and Rohit Would Not Have Given Us...‚Äô Head Coach Rahul Dravid Explains Why Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma Did Not Play IND vs WI 2nd ODI 2023 (Watch Video) The season will see the participation of five teams - Colombo Strikers captained by Niroshan Dickwella, Dambulla Aura captained by Kusal Mendis, Galle Titans led by Dasun Shanaka, B-Love Kandy captained by Wanindu Hasaranga and the defending champions Jaffna Kings will be led by veteran Srilankan allrounder Thisara Perera. The fourth edition will also feature top International stars like David Miller, Babar Azam, Chris Lynn and Shakib Al Hasan who will be entertaining the fans in the league along with top-class Sri Lankan players like Mahesh Theekshana, Bhanuka Rajapaksa and Angelo Mathews. Ashes 2023: Ricky Ponting Keen To See England's Batting Approach in Second Innings of ENG vs AUS 5th Test. The teams will be facing each other twice in a round-robin league format in group-stage games starting from July 30. The top four teams on the points table will qualify for the playoffs which will begin on August 17 and the final will be played on August 20 with August 21 kept as a rain reserve day. *Team Captains -Colombo Strikers: Niroshan Dickwella-Dambulla Aura: Kusal Mendis-Galle Titans: Dasun Shanaka-Jaffna Kings: Thisara Perera-B-Love Kandy: Wanindu Hasaranga *Squads -Colombo Strikers Babar Azam, newsArray.title: Watch: Virat makes young fan's day by wearing bracelet she made for him
newsArray.description: A young girl in Barbados had a dream-come-true moment on Saturday when Virat Kohli came all the way to her in the stands and not just accepted the bracelet she had made for him but also wore it.

newsArray.title: Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs historic six sixes molded me into the competitor I am today: Stuart Broad
creator: Deepa Sharma
newsArray.description: England‚Äôs veteran pacer, Stuart Broad, looked back on a defining moment in his cricketing career, attributing his transformation into a formidable competitor to Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs iconic six sixes during the 2007 T20 World Cup clash between India and England in Durban. In a press conference, Broad acknowledged that the unforgettable encounter, was instrumental in shaping [‚Ä¶] The post Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs historic six sixes molded me into the competitor I am today: Stuart Broad appeared first on KalingaTV.
newsArray.content: England‚Äôs veteran pacer, Stuart Broad, looked back on a defining moment in his cricketing career, attributing his transformation into a formidable competitor to Yuvraj Singh‚Äôs iconic six sixes during the 2007 T20 World Cup clash between India and England in Durban. In a press conference, Broad acknowledged that the unforgettable encounter, was instrumental in shaping his mental approach to the game. The momentous match on September 19, 2007, saw Yuvraj Singh, in a sensational display of power-hitting, become the first batsman to dispatch six consecutive sixes in an over during a T20 International. The 22-year-old Broad found himself on the receiving end of Yuvraj‚Äôs ferocious assault, as the Indian batsman sent the ball soaring into all corners of the stadium, propelling India‚Äôs total beyond the formidable 200-run mark. Reflecting on that day, Broad admitted, ‚ÄúYeah, it was obviously a pretty tough day. What would I have been: 21, 22? [22] I learned loads. I pretty much based a whole mental routine through that experience, knowing that I was left very short as an international performer in that moment. I‚Äôd rushed my preparation. I didn‚Äôt have any sort of pre-ball routine. I didn‚Äôt have any focus, particularly, and I started building my ‚Äòwarrior mode‚Äô that I call it after that experience.‚Äù ‚ÄúYou obviously go through massive peaks and troughs, and when you look at someone like Stokesy‚Äôs career, he‚Äôs done that sort of thing as well. Most players have. But ultimately I think it‚Äôs that bounce-back ability and that ability to be able to put poor days behind you because certainly one thing over the past whatever ‚Äì 15, 16 years ‚Äì you have a lot more bad days than good days in cricket so you have to be able to deal with them to make sure your good days can flourish,‚Äù Broad concluded. Prev News Next News

newsArray.description: While West Zone would be confident of their win against Central Zone in the last match, North Zone would want to bounce back hard from a loss to East Zone in their previous encounter. Scroll down to get live streaming and telecast details of this match,

The fixture is set to feature some exciting names in the competition and it would be played at the Cricket Association Puducherry Siechem Ground, starting at 1:30 pm IST (Indian Standard Time). The live telecast of this match will not be available as there is no official broadcast partner, with BCCI's media rights yet to be sold. But fans can watch live streaming online of this match on the BCCI.TV and BCCI app and website. Deodhar Trophy 2023: West Zone Win Thriller Over Central Zone by 1 Wicket. newsArray.title: Un centro de cricket dentro del 'Sky Stadium', el estadio donde jugar√° Espa√±a
creator: Pablo Parra
newsArray.content: a selecci√≥n espa√±ola jugar√° su tercer partido en el Sky Stadium, Estadio regional de Wellington, para la FIFA. Se trata de un ciertamente inc√≥modo para los medios de comunicaci√≥n y que el m√°ximo organismo del f√∫tbol mundial ha tenido que adaptar para el campeonato del mundo. . Habitualmente es un estadio de rugby, donde juegan los Wellington Lions y los Wellington Hurricanes. Es tambi√©n el hogar del equipo de f√∫tbol Wellington Phoenix, de la A-League. A ello hay que sumar que dentro del estadio, lo que en este Mundial est√° siendo el centro de trabajo de los medios de comunicaci√≥n, . Concretamente es la Escuela de Wellington de Cricket, dirigida por la Asociaci√≥n de Cricket de Wellington.. De hecho, el techo conserva las redes y las mallas necesarias en dicho deporte. En una de las paredes, aparecen nombres hist√≥ricos del cricket de la ciudad. Por otro lado, el recorrido que existe entre la tribuna habilitada para los medios de comunicaci√≥n es tan largo que para poder facilitar el trabajo al t√©rmino de los encuentros. . Aqu√≠ debut√≥ contra Costa Rica con una victoria contundente por 3-0 gracias a los goles de la selecci√≥n 'tica' en propia puerta, Esther Gonz√°lez y Aitana Bonmat√≠, con lo cual ya sabe lo que es lograr una victoria en este especial enclave a las afueras de la ciudad en el que, adem√°s, se nota el paso de los trenes por las v√≠as aleda√±as al terreno de juego.

newsArray.title: ‚ÄòTo Take 600 Wickets and‚Ä¶‚Äô Team India Head Coach Rahul Dravid Praises 'Special Cricketer' Stuart Broad With England Pacer Set to Retire After Ashes 2023
newsArray.description: India head coach Rahul Dravid has described the retiring England fast bowler Stuart Broad as a "special cricketer", whose great partnership with James Anderson will be remembered for ages.
newsArray.content: Bridgetown, July 30 : India head coach Rahul Dravid has described the retiring England fast bowler Stuart Broad as a "special cricketer", whose great partnership with James Anderson will be remembered for ages. The 37-year-old Broad on Saturday announced that he will retire from international cricket after the conclusion of the ongoing final Ashes Test against Australia at The Kia Oval in London. IND vs WI 2nd ODI 2023: Bowlers, Shai Hope Help West Indies Level Series . "He (Broad) has been a terrific bowler, he has been a great. His partnership with Jimmy Anderson will always be remembered," Dravid said after India lost to West Indies by six wickets in the second ODI here. "Anderson and Broad the whole decade they played for England, they have really put in some fantastic performances," said the batting legend and former India captain. "To take 600 wickets and to play the number of Test matches he has takes a special kind of cricketer," he added. Broad has been a key member of the England Test side since making his debut against Sri Lanka in December 2007. He will retire with 167 caps, and is the second highest Test wicket-taker after Anderson among pacers. He had taken 600 wickets before the ongoing final Ashes Test. The right-arm seamer, who made his first-class debut for Leicestershire in 2005 and later moved to Nottinghamshire, has played 121 ODIs and 56 T20 Internationals, picking up 178 and 65 wickets respectively. Dravid congratulated Broad on a wonderful career. "My best wishes to him and congratulations on a fantastic career. I hope he gets to finish it off in the best possible way he wants to," he said.

newsArray.title: Lanka Premier League 2023: All You Need to Know About Fourth Edition of Sri Lanka's T20 Tournament
newsArray.description: The season will see the participation of five teams - Colombo Strikers captained by Niroshan Dickwella, Dambulla Aura captained by Kusal Mendis, Galle Titans led by Dasun Shanaka, B-Love Kandy captained by Wanindu Hasaranga and the defending champions Jaffna Kings will be led by veteran Srilankan allrounder Thisara Perera.
newsArray.content: Colombo [Sri Lanka], July 29 : The Lanka Premier League (LPL) is scheduled to take place from July 30 to August 21, 2023. This will be the fourth edition of the highly anticipated league which will feature some top stars from global cricket fighting for the coveted title. As per a press release from LPL, the matches will be held across two venues Colombo and Kandy for the 2023 edition. ‚ÄòPlaying Virat and Rohit Would Not Have Given Us...‚Äô Head Coach Rahul Dravid Explains Why Virat Kohli, Rohit Sharma Did Not Play IND vs WI 2nd ODI 2023 (Watch Video) The season will see the participation of five teams - Colombo Strikers captained by Niroshan Dickwella, Dambulla Aura captained by Kusal Mendis, Galle Titans led by Dasun Shanaka, B-Love Kandy captained by Wanindu Hasaranga and the defending champions Jaffna Kings will be led by veteran Srilankan allrounder Thisara Perera. The fourth edition will also feature top International stars like David Miller, Babar Azam, Chris Lynn and Shakib Al Hasan who will be entertaining the fans in the league along with top-class Sri Lankan players like Mahesh Theekshana, Bhanuka Rajapaksa and Angelo Mathews. Ashes 2023: Ricky Ponting Keen To See England's Batting Approach in Second Innings of ENG vs AUS 5th Test. The teams will be facing each other twice in a round-robin league format in group-stage games starting from July 30. The top four teams on the points table will qualify for the playoffs which will begin on August 17 and the final will be played on August 20 with August 21 kept as a rain reserve day. *Team Captains -Colombo Strikers: Niroshan Dickwella-Dambulla Aura: Kusal Mendis-Galle Titans: Dasun Shanaka-Jaffna Kings: Thisara Perera-B-Love Kandy: Wanindu Hasaranga *Squads -Colombo Strikers Babar Azam,
